post.body: If you never put the tree uP, It's so much easier to take DOwn. Just say'n...
one man uses in moderation to add value, another man overdoses and destroys (unintentionally) himself and those he loves.
the website is real & emotional - mostly seductive. Don't know about the scent. You'll have to get some to see, ah, smell!!!
I'll be worried 'till your safe in bed, Off the ice... (maybe sawing wood..)
proof is in the pudding. Do I hear a tweetup?
I follow your example... (trying to hide the slightest smirk)
Did you get a facelift to your blog? I LOVE it. The last podcast Sparkles!
wikipedia complicates the story! http://is.gd/3h23 a "double bind" a "no win situation" can God move an unmoveable object.
I'm ready to undecorate today! @Mar2Mom wants to wait 'tip Valentines...
Amish ethnic? Dienner's Country Restaurant http://www.dienners.com/ hahah... pretty good though
listening to the 2nd track now. Excellent! I love the broken-driving rythm, with subtle blasting brass No need to send CD!
iPhone will bring you 2 together!!! @hollygolightly4 There are games that you can play each other if your on the same WiFi
a real picture would be great! I don't know If I'd recognize those blue eyes/flat nose on a brown paperbag?
nice! Now I know what you listen to. Is christmas music still on?
awee.... my 3yr old Soren says to the pic of Benjamin, "I like your puppy & Kitty!" (he noticed the thumbs in twitpic)
Awesome! Congratulations. Now the fun begins!
Cheri's the best! She will deliver your little man with a gusto... Can't wait to hear more in the morning!
the bes' snora! Zzz...
my my. Sigh... I'd rather eat and miss a little tv, than watch TV and starve. Haha!
sneaky... Work should be about over. Aye?
will be missing the Eden Mixer tonight. :( 'cause we're having friends over :)
yippy... the 9) quotes that were going to be sent out LAST monday, are ready for @mar2mom to mail. Sorry. Your welcome.
Authentic touches us all. http://snipr.com/8npk0 Ladies, you pave the way! Thanks @msmonogram for a great (fb)link http://snipr.com/8npxu
thinking that Burger King is desparate. Greasy burger in a bottle? ichk http://www.firemeetsdesire.com/
I don't think my body got the memo to "WAKE UP". Rectus femoris is annoyed for some reason - maybe some catch up anxiety.
freezing my fingers typing these words. (as my fingers tuck themselves into the coat pocket) off to cardio - Gotta get back in shape
sleep heals. and I have a cold to finish healing. g'night tweeps
Pete's cool scoop on "the Art of Learning" (as in learning from busy or good leaders) http://snipr.com/8guji
and on to ISP hosting also via ESBI billing. frontier & ESBI should share quality time at Guantanamo Bay... for stealing my haircut money
wasting unvaluable time cancelling an ESBI billing from IBA-services. it should be a crime for frontier to allow this! $39.95 per month.
certification lapsed due to $35 renewal fee (that I missed) - NOT the credits. Now my credits are good 'till 2012. Awesome! (forced smile)
sighing... all that Exciting continuing education (for credits) yesterday. I didn't actually need it 'till 9-2009.
Soren asked for a sippie of chocolate milk, guess we'll sleep downstairs the rest of the morning. (hopefully 2 more hours - sigh...)
zzzzzz.... zzzzzz.... _______
Our loot from Park City. Boscovs is the best again! http://twitpic.com/x0nt
At Lyndons Diner waiting for a table for the 5Tribe http://twitpic.com/wzg3
whoever didn't feel that earthquake last night in Lancy, musta been having their own earthquake - that's all I can say.
I asked Brielle where she wants to go for Breakfast, "The barrel place! where they have a campfire and pancakes!!!"
Well, it's time for this ship to pick up anchor and sail for home. This voyage has been long enough. Our loot is large...
Shrimp and pizza feast. I think my tank is on double FULL! http://twitpic.com/wtz7
